law_name: The Capital of the Republic (Determination of Area) Ordinance

sections.body: This Ordinance may be called the Capital of the Republic (Determination of Area) Ordinance, 1963.

The area specified in the Schedule measuring three hundred and fifty square miles or thereabout within the district of Rawalpindi in the Province of the Punjab at the site selected for the Capital of Pakistan shall be the area of the Capital of the Republic.
